name: Super Smash Bros Infinity
description:
This is a project i've been wanting to do using the MUGEN 1.1 Engine and recreating one of my favorite games Smash Bro's. Super Smash Bro's Infinity is a Fan Made Smash Bros Game that uses similar aspects/images/ and battle style like Smash Bros. But with a JUS style and Mugen Style Twist To It with Characters You Always Wanted to Join But never had the chance to make it

Play as the Classics Such as Mario, Link, or Samus or even the New Comers Goku, Sora, or Zero from MegaMan X. To Smash Your Way to the Top Even Play With Your Friends Locally, or Use Parse to Crush them Online as well
